topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: Attackers allegedly exfiltrated 200 GB of data, including labour inspection reports, complaints and legal dispute files, and personal email information.Sources: - https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m64xmmrtc72x

topic: attack hack exploit scam fraud breach leak
eventSummary: The Cl0p hacking group has added 29 more alleged victims to its breach campaign exploiting a Zero-day vulnerability in Oracle E-Business Suite.Sources: - https://bsky.app/profile/hackmanac.com/post/3m64skf64h42x
